titleStmt.title: A lottery licensed by His Royal Highness the Duke of York, and assistants of the Corporation of the Royal Fishing, errected by the author, for the vending certain volumes of his own books.
titleStmt.author: Ogilby, John, 1600-1676.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Ogilby. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
